divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside the shop to have a cigarette. I noticed how pretty the sun looked behind the clouds and decided to take a picture. I didn't like that the first one had the trailer a connex box in it, so I walked out into the field and took another. I uploaded the photo (portrait layout) to Facebook and noticed the unknown object in the picture. I didn't actually see it before the picture because the sun was bright. I have both pictures (uploaded), taken maybe 30 seconds apart. Photos taken with my iPhone 4.
Summary: Tood a picture of the sunrise, posted it to facebook and noticed this.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gilroy
There was one other sighting in Gilroy on or around July 23rd 2013
